boardgame.description: Built on the core of the award-winning Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island, First Martians: Adventures on the Red Planet pits players against the hostile Martian environment and a whole host of new adventures and challenges. The immersive experience is further enhanced with an integrated app that maintains the balance and challenge throughout. Players have the option of taking on the design as a series of separate games, in a custom campaign mode in which each successive game builds on the last._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This copy of First Martians is in like new condition and has only been played once. It is the pre-order edition that includes washed minis and additional components such as extra POI tokens. The components have been separated and organized neatly. I will also provide the Watch it Played First Martians promos for FREE when they are available. These tokens can be found on Rodney Smith_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s indiegogo page for Watch it Played Season 7. $15 flat rate shipping via FedEx Ground with tracking and insurance to any continental US address. If you live in Hawaii, Alaska, outside the US or have a military address, please contact me for a shipping quote first. I ship all games within 1 business day of payment being received. Paypal is the preferred method of payment. Please contact me first if you want to use a different payment method. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to message me. All messages are forward directly to my e-mail where I am very fast to respond.
Pre-Order copy Removed shrink wrap Never played I will ship from Katy, Texas via FedEx or UPS Contact me with any questions
